original_title: Jeg har ikke tid til det her
overview: There’s a huge problem. The wristwatch that David’s company launches in a few days has a mistake. It doesn’t count seconds precisely.   This comes up hours before a planned couples vacation. Torn between a huge career opportunity and a vacation with his girlfriend, David forgoes common sense and tries to fix the watch so his co-worker won’t get the credit for it, whilst also enjoying drinks on the beach.
title: I don't have time for this
